subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: UConn battled through injury and self-doubt to win a national title over Louisville and give Coach Geno Auriemma the same number of championships as his nemesis, Pat Summitt.
snippet: UConn battled through injury and self-doubt to win a national title over Louisville and give Coach Geno Auriemma the same number of championships as his nemesis, Pat Summitt.
